pages.text: As you discover objects with your telescope they will be displayed here for you to learn more about them.

pages.title: Discovery 5: The Crab Nebula
pages.image: The Crab Nebula was first observed by Chinese astronomers in 1054 CE who believed it to be a star. It is the remains of a supernova explosion
